identity.name: Voyager
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix editorial magazine aesthetics with productivity tool precision
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel like the start of a journey
Content is King: High-quality imagery takes center stage; UI recedes
Zoom In: Focus on the details of the itinerary
Negative Space: Let the travel dreams breathe

usage.headings: Use Playfair Display for all major section headers to evoke a premium travel magazine feel.
usage.body: Use Manrope for all UI elements, itineraries, and data displays for maximum legibility.
usage.interactive: Buttons and navigation links should use Manrope with slightly increased tracking.

background.usage: Main application background. Avoid pure white.

grids.bento_hero: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-8 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-4 md:gap-8

buttons.primary: bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 shadow-lg shadow-orange-500/20
buttons.secondary: bg-white dark:bg-slate-800 border border-stone-200 dark:border-slate-700 hover:bg-stone-100 dark:hover:bg-slate-700 text-foreground rounded-full px-6 py-4 transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-stone-100 dark:hover:bg-slate-800 text-foreground rounded-full px-4 py-2

cards.trip_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-stone-200 dark:border-slate-800 shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1
cards.activity_card: flex flex-col gap-2 p-4 rounded-xl bg-stone-50 dark:bg-slate-800/50 border border-stone-100 dark:border-slate-700 hover:border-orange-200 dark:hover:border-orange-900 transition-colors
cards.stat_card: p-6 rounded-xl bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-stone-100 dark:border-slate-800 shadow-sm

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-lg border-stone-200 dark:border-slate-700 bg-transparent focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500/20 focus:border-orange-500 transition-all

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px for a refined look.

general_rules: Use 'stone-50' (light) and 'slate-950' (dark) for backgrounds, never pure white/black.
Do not use 'transition-all'. Specify properties like 'transition-colors' or 'transition-transform'.
Ensure all images have 'object-cover' and proper aspect ratios.

key_elements: Hero section with 'Sunset over water' image and parallax effect
Recent trips grid using 'Trip Card' component
Quick actions row with pill-shaped buttons
Full-screen hero with large Playfair Display typography

universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Be bold with spacing (p-8, p-12).
Use glassmorphism for sticky headers: 'bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/20'.
Never center text by default. Use left alignment for readability.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1-H3 headings. Use 'Manrope' for body.
Primary color is Orange-500. Use it sparingly for high-impact actions.
